Subject: To attack or not to attack?
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::DrillBit::

"Hmmm."
He opened a comm.
"DarkFate, Killfest, never mind. It was a false alarm."
He watched Dark Mouse leave. Why did she seem like the little sister?
He turns back to KitKat, taking her into his arms.
"Well, I guess the war has given us some time."
He once again kisses her.
